sentences.en: Cheer up. Don't be such a sourpuss.
sentences.cn: 快乐一点吧. 不要成天绷着个脸.

sentences.en: Hung - chien laughed at her for being such a sourpuss.
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 笑她拿糖作醋.

sentences.en: I do not Even want to go near that grouchy old sourpuss.
sentences.cn: 我一点儿也不想接近那个满腹牢骚,永远黑着面孔的人.

trans.tran_cn: <非正>阴郁的人，整天绷着脸的人，性情乖戾的人
